net.derquinse.bocas
Class BocasServices

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      net.derquinse.bocas.BocasServices

@Beta
public final class BocasServices
extends NotInstantiable

Factory class for bocas repositories and buckets.

Method Detail

memoryBucket

public static Bocas memoryBucket()
Creates a new heap-based bucket.

directBucket

public static Bocas directBucket()
Creates a new memory-based bucket based on direct buffers.

cache

public static GuavaCachingBocasBuilder cache()
Creates a new caching repository builder.

decorate

public static BocasService decorate(BocasService service,
                                    BocasDecorator decorator)
Decorates an existing service. Bucket closing (both source and decorated) is the caller's responsibility.

Parameters:
service - Service to decorate.
decorator - Bucket decorator.

seeded

public static Bocas seeded(Bocas primary,
                           Bocas seed)
Creates a new bocas bucket that fetches entries missing in the primary bucket from the provided seed. Writes are not propagated to the seed. Closing is a no-op.

shared

public static BocasService shared(Bocas bucket,
                                  Predicate<String> validName)
Creates a new service that shares a single bucket among several names.

Parameters:
bucket - Bucket to share.
validName - Valid names.

shared

public static BocasService shared(Bocas bucket)
Creates a new service that shares a single bucket for every possible bucket name..

Parameters:
bucket - Bucket to share.

syncReplica

public static Bocas syncReplica(Bocas primary,
                                Bocas replica,
                                boolean check)
Creates a new bocas bucket that synchronously replicates writes to the primary bucket into a replica. Closing both buckets is the responsibility of the caller.

Parameters:
primary - Primary bucket.
replica - Replica bucket.
check - Whether to check for existing entries before writing.

syncReplica

public static BocasService syncReplica(BocasService primary,
                                       BocasService replica,
                                       boolean check)
Creates a new bocas service that synchronously replicates writes to the primary service buckets into the replica buckets. Bucket closing is the responsibility of the caller.

Parameters:
primary - Primary service.
replica - Replica service.
check - Whether to check for existing entries before writing.

multiServiceCache

public static MultiServiceGuavaCacheBuilder multiServiceCache()
Creates a new builder for a cache shared among multiple services.
